"Xiera": "Photon Blades remain embedded in the enemy for a while after they hit, and if you attack the embedded blades, you get a <red>bonus effect<c>!"
"デュアルブレードとフォトンブレードの波状攻撃で、縦横無尽に華麗な連撃をバシっと決めてくださいね！"
"If you hit an enemy or part that has Photon Blades embedded in it, you recover more PP and generate more Dual Blade Gear than usual."
